pages.text: We've done multiple scans of your brain since we found you in that slab of ice, and we have bad news and good news.$(br2)The good news is that you have an extremely well-developed cerebellum, and your body was preserved in almost pristine condition. We replicated your original body in the simulation so it should not feel alien to you.

$(primary)XC-443s body is really adapt at digging, the test subject can use the 'Ore Excavation' trait to make quick work of ore veins. Bound by the 'Excavate' key in the control mappings.$()$(br2)Current keybind: $(item)$(k:oreexcavation.key.excavate)$()$(br2)The bad news is that your cerebral cortex does not really match up with our more superior brains, so let's hope you can keep up.
Oh, and you can get teleported into a cave, so put those caveman genes to work!$(br2)Because of this possibility you have been supplied with a starter set of $(item)Tools$() that will let you dig up.
